div.a: Google Set To Release iOS Maps App Tonight

div.div: Google plans to release its much-awaited iOS Maps app tonight, according to sources familiar with the matter.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SSkZ3R&via=Digg&text=Google Set To Release iOS Maps App Tonight

div.a: Watch The Hurricane Sandy Relief Concert

div.div: The concert for Hurricane Sandy Relief is being streamed live from Madison Square Garden.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VA1lZ4&via=Digg&text=Watch The Hurricane Sandy Relief Concert

div.a: The Most Creative Failed Smuggling Attempts

div.div: From cocaine breast implants to an ecstasy-stuffed Mr. Potato Head, here are some of the best smuggling attempts that didn't succeed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SchIj9&via=Digg&text=The Most Creative Failed Smuggling Attempts

div.div: The Washington Post sorted through an entire year's worth of editorial cartoons so you didn't have to. You're welcome.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sc6BXr&via=Digg&text=The Year In Cartoons

div.div: Few among us can gaze up at a steel city scaffold and say with utter confidence, "I can climb that." Fewer still can vault from bar to bar, or leap out over open air to land on a wooden railing the width of a strip of duct tape. For parkour athletes, however, this is child's play.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SdHPWU&via=Digg&text=Learning To Parkour

div.div: IT'S THAT TIME OF YEAR AGAIN

div.a: In Defense Of The Wall Street Bonus

div.div: It's nearly January, the time of every year when Wall Street banks pay their employees and executives their annual year-end bonuses and the rest of America freaks out about how outrageously big they are.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UC33YP&via=Digg&text=In Defense Of The Wall Street Bonus

div.a: Bizarre Weather Around the Solar System

div.div: Bizarre weather is not restricted to Earth. Hurricane Sandy was a speck of dust compared to some of the cataclysms currently taking place around the solar system.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S5mhvk&via=Digg&text=Bizarre Weather Around the Solar System

div.a: How Do You Play With Your Dog?

div.div: Millions of people around the world come home to four legs and a wagging tail, and many spend some of their time together playing. While dog-dog play has been studied extensively, dog-person play, which takes on a different form and appears to have different rules, has not attracted nearly as much scholarly attention.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UjxjZF&via=Digg&text=How Do You Play With Your Dog?

div.a: The Absurd Ways The Military Wastes Taxpayer Dollars

div.div: The David Petraeus scandal has shined a light on the luxurious, subsidized lifestyle of the U.S. military’s top generals. But so far, what the media has uncovered only scratches the surface of the abuses. Here are seven absurd ways the military wastes our money–and none of them have anything to do with national defense.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZfqIpF&via=Digg&text=The Absurd Ways The Military Wastes Taxpayer Dollars

div.a: Can You Guess Which Character's Facial Hair This Is?

div.div: How well have you been keeping track of all the year's facial hair? Can you tell a TV star's luscious face locks from those of a movie's supporting character? Or do you just assume everyone is Mandy Patinkin? Hir-suit up for our quiz and see if you can face (-shul hair) the music.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TVb9PV&via=Digg&text=Can You Guess Which Character's Facial Hair This Is?

div.div: PAINTING IT WOULD PROBABLY BE EASIER

div.a: Constructing The Mona Lisa With 50 Polygons And A Genetic Algorithm

div.div: Could you paint a replica of the Mona Lisa using only 50 semi transparent polygons? That is the challenge one man decided to set for himself.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U9baO0&via=Digg&text=Constructing The Mona Lisa With 50 Polygons And A Genetic Algorithm

div.div: BECAUSE THEN PEOPLE WOULD WATCH C-SPAN

div.a: Why Stephen Colbert Deserves South Carolina’s Senate Seat

div.div: South Carolina is just crazy enough to consider appointing the on-air comic to replace Jim DeMint. Here's why they should actually go through with it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sd2qdG&via=Digg&text=Why Stephen Colbert Deserves South Carolina’s Senate Seat

div.a: The Largest Iceberg Break-Up Ever Filmed

div.div: "It's like watching Manhattan breaking apart in front of your eyes."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xa6GHE&via=Digg&text=The Largest Iceberg Break-Up Ever Filmed

div.div: PLEAD INSANITY DUE TO BIEBER FEVER

div.a: Police Break Up Alleged Plot To Kill, Castrate Justin Bieber

div.div: Investigators say two would-be hit men from Albuquerque may have had their sights set on the teen mega star; Justin Bieber.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/128ghUy&via=Digg&text=Police Break Up Alleged Plot To Kill, Castrate Justin Bieber

div.a: The North Korean Anchorwoman Who Unveiled The Rocket Launch Is Amazing

div.div: Enthusiastic North Korean news anchor Ri Chun Hee is the type of TV person I want to be one day: theatlanticwire.com/global...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SbySxg&via=Digg&text=The North Korean Anchorwoman Who Unveiled The Rocket Launch Is Amazing

div.a: How Far Can North Korea's Missiles Reach?

div.div: Experts say the same technology it takes to put a 100kg satellite into orbit could be the first step towards firing an intercontinental ballistic missile with an equivalent payload at America, provided that North Korea could also master re-entry and accuracy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UCS7dv&via=Digg&text=How Far Can North Korea's Missiles Reach?

div.div: GUESS YOU'LL HAVE TO BING "ANNE HATHAWAY"

div.a: Google Just Made It Harder To Find Porn

div.div: The company rolled out a change to its image search algorithm overnight that makes it tougher to stumble across adult pictures, whether or not you're searching for them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VATbj7&via=Digg&text=Google Just Made It Harder To Find Porn

div.div: John McAfee's odyssey on the run opened a new chapter after Guatemala deported the former Silicon Valley millionaire wanted for questioning in Belize over the murder of a fellow American.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TV53PE&via=Digg&text=Guatemala Uninstalls McAfee

div.a: Mall Suspect Jacob Tyler Roberts Liked 'Shooting' On His Facebook Page

div.div: Oregon police have identified the shooter in Tuesday night's shooting at a shopping mall shooting outside Portland. Authorities are saying they don't have a motive for the shootings just yet — that it was a random act of violence — but we stumbled across what appears to be his Facebook page and discovered, well, a lot of violent signs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UjSpH4&via=Digg&text=Mall Suspect Jacob Tyler Roberts Liked 'Shooting' On His Facebook Page

div.a: This May Be The Most Distant Galaxy Ever Found

div.div: Astronomers using the Hubble Space Telescope have uncovered seven primitive galaxies from a distant population that formed more than 13 billion years ago. In the process, their observations have put forward a candidate for the record for the most distant galaxy found to date.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RpxBmd&via=Digg&text=This May Be The Most Distant Galaxy Ever Found

div.div: Society needs a few individuals with a fear of disease, because they can persuade the rest of us to get immunised, according to a new study.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VA3ELu&via=Digg&text=Why Hypochondriacs Keep Us Healthy

div.a: America Used To Have A Secret Plan For Global Indiscriminate Nuclear Annihilation

div.div: Up until 1968, the United States government had a Top Secret plan for what to do in the event that the president died or went missing under mysterious circumstances. The plan was: Nuke the sh*t out of everyone right now.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UU8kPR&via=Digg&text=America Used To Have A Secret Plan For Global Indiscriminate Nuclear Annihilation

div.div: Give the pixel five years, researchers say, and it'll be dead--cast aside for a vector format.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TPgRAj&via=Digg&text=R.I.P. Pixels?

div.div: Paul McCartney will sub for Kurt Cobain as Nirvana reunites for Wednesday night's special Hurricane Sandy relief concert at Madison Square Garden.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TP2RGK&via=Digg&text=Paul McCartney Joins Nirvana

div.div: This baby is so fresh she doesn’t even have a name yet, but she definitely has a number.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VAPZE6&via=Digg&text=Behold The 12/12/12 12:12 Baby
